This app analyze the sound heard by *this* device. A permission of using microphone is required.
Window function for (local) short-time Fourier transform (STFT)
Higher percentage for finer time resolution, lower to save CPU
Use lines instead of bars (area) for spectrum
Show range of spectrum in dB scale
The whole spectrogram shifts on a rolling basis over time
So time axis is Y axis
Choose color of dB to map
Show range of spectrogram in dB scale
Show duration of spectrogram (when average number is set to 1)
Higher for smoother graphic, lower to save battery.
Show warning if audio buffer enters overrun state
Replot spectrogram only while zooming (saves battery)
